sentences.en: Family values are suddenly the name of the game.
sentences.cn: 家庭价值观突然变得重要起来。

sentences.en: He may suddenly take a dislike to foods that he's previously enjoyed.
sentences.cn: 对以前爱吃的食物，他兴许突然就没了胃口。

sentences.en: He suddenly smiled, revealing teeth that had recently been capped.
sentences.cn: 他突然笑了出来，露出了刚箍过的牙。

sentences.en: I suddenly realized that there was someone following me.
sentences.cn: 我突然意识到有人跟着我。

sentences.en: Nancy, who had been thoughtful for some time, suddenly spoke.
sentences.cn: 南希沉思了一会儿，突然开口说话了。

sentences.en: On the stroke of 12, fireworks suddenly exploded into the night.
sentences.cn: 12点的钟声刚敲响，焰火便在夜空中绽放。

sentences.en: Poems which had seemed dull and boring suddenly came to life.
sentences.cn: 原本显得沉闷枯燥的诗歌突然有了生气。

sentences.en: She suddenly became very vehement and agitated, jumping around and shouting.
sentences.cn: 她突然变得激动狂躁，四处乱跳还大喊大叫。

sentences.en: She suddenly realized that Wim was reciting Kirk's telephone number.
sentences.cn: 她突然意识到威姆正在念的是柯克的电话号码。

sentences.en: Suddenly a bolt of lightning crackled through the sky.
sentences.cn: 突然一道闪电划破长空。

sentences.en: Suddenly he laughed again, this time with a cold, sharp tone.
sentences.cn: 突然他又笑了，这次笑得冷漠、刺耳。

sentences.en: Suddenly I was cartwheeling down the slope, all orientation gone.
sentences.cn: 突然，我骨碌碌地滚下坡，完全晕头转向了。

sentences.en: Suddenly music that seemed dull and repetitive comes alive.
sentences.cn: 突然间，似乎索然无味且反反复复的音乐生动了起来。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the eagle opened its wings.
Suddenly, the narrator speaks in his most rhetorically elevated mode.
sentences.cn: 突然，解说员开始用高昂煽情的语调解说起来。

sentences.en: The bang came suddenly, echoing across the buildings, shattering glass.
sentences.cn: 突如其来的一声巨响在建筑物间回荡着，震碎了玻璃。

sentences.en: Two men suddenly elbowed a passage through the shoppers.
sentences.cn: 两名男子突然用肘在购物者中挤出一条路。

trans.tran_cn: 意外地，忽然地，出乎意料，霍然
